name: Big's Burger Bomb
description:
Bob's Burger Bomb is a top down action boss rush! inspired by classic Zeldas

Play as McKenzie Donald, and explore Bob's Burger Bomb, an ancient ruin that was once a fast food restaurant. On the look for the last ancient nugget, McKenzie will face great foes in this boss rush!

ENDLESS MODE: Face bosses that get increasingly harder each time. More health, more attacks, more aggression!

CONTROLS:
Movement- WASD
Dodge - Space
Attack - Left Click

CREATED BY THE MARSHMALLOW BANDITS
Lead Designer - https://hazedoron.itch.io/
Engineer - MonkeyWrenchSoft
Artist - https://jlawless.itch.io/
Music and SFX - Tyler Gonelli

This game was created for the the Boss Rush Jam 2021 https://itch.io/jam/boss-rush-jam-2021

We hope you enjoy!
